description: Personal project for week 15 of the Iungo software development bootcamp.
Creating a banking app that could deposit and withdraw funds. I was also given the added task of completing this in TypeScript.
A fun personal project of mine. The current aim of the project is to provide a way of tracking episodes you've watched, whilst also providing fun little bits on the side.
A test to create a glossary of terms. Clicking on each in the list will change the presented information and images on the right.
